abstract.t: The System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM) specification is an HTTP based protocol that makes managing identities in multi- domain scenarios easier to support through a standardized services. SCIM provides extension points that enable new ResourceTypes and Schema Extensions to be defined. This specification defines a set of password and account status extensions for managing passwords and password usage (e.g. failures) and other related session data. The specification defines new ResourceTypes that enable management of passwords and account recovery functions.
